title: Stablexcoin
author: Stablexcoin
content: Hello everyone. I am June, a digital product designer. A friend told me about this platform and I joined, hoping to gain more insights about web3 and other related subjects. As a product designer, I have been in the web3 space for about 3 years now. I have designed a couple of web and mobile apps. I hope to make useful connections and possible collaborators from this platform. If you are a product designer here, ðŸ™‹ hi and hello to all the smart contract developers. I hope to learn from you all. I am very passionate about building digital products and improving experiences. I would appreciate suggestions on how I can improve this platform with my skill.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Hi June, welcome to Bitcointalk forum. If you're looking for the people that has the same interest as you or projects or people that wants to have a collab with you. Just go to Project Development. You'll see startups and projects that are work in progress there. You can also offer your service here by making another thread that includes your portfolio and you can get paid in Bitcoin by posting it on the Services and if you want to get paid with altcoin, it should be on Marketplace (Altcoins).

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Stablexcoin on November 01, 2023, 11:33:39 PMHello everyone. I am June, a digital product designer. Hello June, I am July Â Now seriously, welcome here, it's always good to see new people and fresh ideas on this forum. I miss it quite a bit.If you are a designer, you already have some experience and completed projects, I suggest you open your ANN in services and present yourself there. Also, post some of your references. That way, the others will be able to get to know you better, and your skills, which will further facilitate your communication and potential cooperation with other members.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Welcome to the forum make sure to read our sticky thread here Newbies - Read before posting.If you want to improve your skills for web3 I have a bookmarked that I can share with lots of guides and tools that you can use for web3 development. Bookmark it I'm sure you will love it.Check this link https://github.com/ahmet/awesome-web3

How to Earn and Learn.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Hi June welcome to the forum hope you enjoy and learn more in this forum don't hesitate to ask others, if you like Web3 meaning you like the EVM chain project and token which you can find at the Altcoin Discussion - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=67.0Personally, I love the Defi World because it keeps changing and somehow people want everything put in crypto so I just like it. You can also do freelancing here by posting your portfolio. Enjoy the forum.

comments.author: Churchillvv
comments.body: Quote from: Stablexcoin on November 01, 2023, 11:33:39 PMHello everyone. I am June, a digital product designer. A friend told me about this platform and I joined, hoping to gain more insights about web3 and other related subjects. As a product designer, I have been in the web3 space for about 3 years now. I have designed a couple of web and mobile apps. I hope to make useful connections and possible collaborators from this platform. If you are a product designer here, ðŸ™‹ hi and hello to all the smart contract developers. I hope to learn from you all. Hi June, you have a very nice skill. Your friend did well to introduce you to a good platform, you in the right places where both your skill will be improved and empowered. Here you can gain all type of knowledge, web3 is not an exception. that you wish to gain as log as you aquire them through the right source and place at the right time. A 3 years experience on web3 and developer is quite appreciated, you should have all grinded background knowledge of coding and programming which will enhance your navigation on this forum. Surely, You will meet almost all type of developers here, which Smart contract developers are included and you got alot of things to learn from them. It is an assurance that you will learn as long as you desire to learn.QuoteI am very passionate about building digital products and improving experiences. I would appreciate suggestions on how I can improve this platform with my skill.Your passion is encouraged, your services will be required very soon while your stay turned on the forum, just keep your ears on the floor to know when such skill is required for any task then your skill will improve the forum by your services. Once again your welcome here!

comments.author: Tuturtinular
comments.body: Quote from: Stablexcoin on November 01, 2023, 11:33:39 PMI am very passionate about building digital products and improving experiences. I would appreciate suggestions on how I can improve this platform with my skill.Hi juni, Welcome to the forums. I'm sure many people here have skills and knowledge about crypto and maybe also about web3. Hope you find the right partner to create amazing web3 projectsBtw, if you have your own project, maybe you can make a post about your application and the community can provide input and suggestions regarding the application you are developing. You have 3 years experience, sounds good bro

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: Hi June, welcome to Bitcointalk forum. Being a Software Developer who is working in Frontend, I appreciate what you do as a professional. Product Designers have a huge responsibility of creating what a user will see and that's what matters the most. Backend functionality is almost the same (CRUD) and it's also easy for a Frontend engineer to convert the idea into reality. So, I am sure I would be able to see your work on the forum, let's try to make something related to Crypto. What do you say?

comments.author: DYING_S0UL
comments.body: If you are here only for altcoins and web3 then check the thread below.Altcoin sectionProject DevelopmentAltcoin DiscussionToken(altcoins)But if you are also here to learn more about bitcointalk and Bitcoin, then check these threads also.Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQNewbies - Read before postingPosting techniqueMerit and rank requirementMake Your Topic Title, Posts More AttractiveTopic Title Style GuideHope that helps and welcome to bitcointalk.

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: Greetings from the forum. Mr. June, I don't have much to add because everything a lot of the forum users have advised you to do is fine. However, there is something you should know about the forum: it's a place where you can also provide suggestions. Since we are all here as a family, you can ask any questions you have and I'm sure you'll get answers from a wide range of forum members. Since you work as a digital product designer, I also think you will have some ideas and that there are some things that won't be too hard for you to do here again.Additionally, participating in a forum does not ensure that you will accomplish your goals soon. As you are aware, patience is a necessity in life, regardless of whether you want to purchase bitcoin or other altcoins with the idea that doing so will help you succeed. Even while you can also be lucky and make a lot of money that way, there are times when you just need to keep your cool and wait to invest your money because you will be responsible for any losses.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk platform mate. I can assure you that you are on the right place. It is nice you listened to your friend by joining this platform. There are lots of professionals here who you can relate with to perfect your skills here. As you already have experience, you can be able to scale through successfully in your filled of specialisation when you engage with your senior colleagues here. I would also encourage you to avoid plagiarism and abide to the platform policies.From what I can see here from previous replies, members have given you links to your request so you read and learn from them. Do well to ask questions where you find difficult about this platform as there are lots of members here willing to assist you scale through.

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: You have the capital to sell your skills here, this is very good for making it easier for you to build connections in the forum. You have to learn the ins and outs of the forum to avoid everything that is prohibited on the forum, I believe you can adapt quickly here. If you are a designer who has completed several projects outside the forum, you can summarize them into a portfolio and then you can create a new topic in Board services to make it easier for other users to get to know you. The skills you have might be useful for project developers who are creating web3 projects, hopefully you can find partners here and collaborate in developing new projects.

comments.author: Wakate
comments.body: You are welcome to the forum and it is quite impressive that you are ready to learn and keep to the forum rule. Staying safe here from getting ban would require your to stick to rules and abide by the guidance of people that had been here before you. There are links that are available you can click and learn about the forum any time you are less busy. Learning about cryptocurrency would need you to be ready to learn and there are some sites that you can use to get more knowledge about what Bitcoin and the crypto market entails. Learning is continuous and you will have to dedicate your time to read and see how people write and respond to opinions without creating unnecessary pressure on others.

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: Welcome, and I guess you are on the right board to introduce yourself but if you want to put out your portfolio for possible marketing purposes then you have to visit the service section to do so, and much more also have to read the rules of the forum and the rules guiding each board here in the forum, because that is the only way you can maximize the many features of the forum for your advantages.You may not necessarily need to introduce yourself by creating a thread for that, but also doing so is not against the forum either and beginner and help is the most appropriate for such posts.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: @Stablexcoin, you are welcome to bitcointalk forum, if your intention is to learn and contribute useful information to the forum then you are fully welcome because, this is the right place for all Bitcoiners and some crypto users. Here in this forum you'll find answer to important question by forum users, but first I'll recommend you go through the forum rules so you'll know the do and don't in this forum, top members and moderators have rights to ban your account if you post any spam content, the rules are very simple and easy to follow if your intention are of good and not of evil. Here in this forum I have received a lot of advises that has lead me to prosperity in my Bitcoin journey, you can also make use of the search button to learn post topics that interests you.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Welcome to the forum mate and I love the fact that youâ€™re able to speak up and since you already made mentioned of working on previous projects, I think it will be wise if you show samples of your previous works as this will also helpÂ  boost your chances of trust especially on the forum and I think there is a special board for developers on the forum. I wish you good luck mate.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on November 02, 2023, 10:21:37 PMWelcome to the forum mate and I love the fact that youâ€™re able to speak up and since you already made mentioned of working on previous projects, I think it will be wise if you show samples of your previous works as this will also help Â boost your chances of trust especially on the forum and I think there is a special board for developers on the forum. I wish you good luck mate.He can go to the services section and see if there are jobs that are related to his experience or expertise. Or better yet, he can create a thread offering his services, there may be people or projects that need his skills.Honing your skills by experience will be a good one to improve what you acquired previously and you can also continue to improve what you have.Also, he can post the link of his previous works. Most people want to see the portfolio so they know they have basis to look at.
